page.title: 10TRANSPORT. TRAFFIC COUNT
page.content:
Date Time Direction Vehicle count 11.07 11.10-11.25 Westward 135 11.07 11.10-11.25 Eastward 150 12.07 08.30-08.45 Westward 265 12.07 08.30-08.45 Eastward 351
These figures were obtained by pupils of{Knowl Hill School,} who stood on the footbridge over the Bath Road outside the school gates.
Before the M4 Motorway was opened the A4 carried all the through traffic. Parents bringing their children to school protested about the dangers involved in crossing such a busy road. Berkshire County Council responded to the parents' protests by installing the footbridge.
